name: You & Me: J?zyk niemiecki - Lekcja 1 (s?ówka)
description: You & Me: J?zyk niemiecki - Lekcja 1 (s?ówka) is a German language educational program, consisting simple six mini games. The first one requires saying the word in the picture. The second one includes matching the word to the image. The third one is all about proper signing the picture. The fourth one, it's a crossword puzzle. The fifth one requires you to guess the hidden picture. The last one - understanding of the spoken word.
